-1.title: Big Inflatable Dog Berkeley
-1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

1.title: Houdinis
1.plot: From a shoplifting Husky to a parrot that cusses like a sailor Bad Dog! documents just how far pets can push their owners and still get unconditional love. We span the globe looking for the naughtiest pets on the planet and crown the baddest of the bad.

2.title: Bad to the Bone
2.plot: From a truck honking delivery dog to a monkey with plenty of attitude to a sleep walking dog that runs into walls, Bad Dog documents just how far pets can push their owners and still get unconditional love.

3.title: Wild Things and Pet-ty Crimes
3.plot: From a crooning piano playing dog to a trampoline busting pet buffalo to a dog that will eat everything and anything in sight, Bad Dog highlights the baddest of the bad!

4.title: Crafty Critters and Pesky Pets
4.plot: From a dog that doesn't know when to stop to a turtle that refuses to slow down to an escape artist with ulterior motives, Bad Dog! meets the baddest pets on the planet and the owners who love them.

5.title: Who's the Boss?
5.plot: From a dog that will go to great lengths to get some food to a goose that will take a bite out of anyone in her vicinity to Denver, the dog with the guiltiest smile of all, Bad Dog tells the "tails" of the world's baddest pets!

6.title: Klepto K-9's and Escape Artists
6.plot: From a dog that will eat the rug out from under you to a pet anteater that will steal your heart to Lucky the escape artist dog who will take us on a journey you have to see to believe, Bad Dog searches the country for the baddest pets!

1.title: Home Wreckers
1.plot: From a dog that latches onto his owner's clothing each time she leaves for work, to three goats that use their owners car as a rock climbing trail, Bad Dog documents just how far pets can push their owners, and still get unconditional love.

2.title: Down and Dirty Dogs
2.plot: From a down and dirty beagle that rocks the foundation of a family by digging under the house, to a cat burglar that steals fish from the freezer, Bad Dog documents just how far pets can push their owners, and still get unconditional love.

3.title: Copy Cats and Double Trouble
3.plot: From a house cat that swats alligators back into the swamp, to an amped up dog that steals coffee, to a monkey that rides the family dog like a race horse, Bad Dog documents just how far pets can push their owners, and still get unconditional love.

4.title: Naughty by Nature
4.plot: From a Houdini hound, to a cunning fat cat, to a rascally pet raccoon, Bad Dog, documents just how far pets can push their owners and still get unconditional love. We span the globe looking for the naughtiest pets, and crown the baddest of the bad.

5.title: Doggy Divas and Cat Burglars
5.plot: A bulldog who won't wake up, a klepto-kitty, plus a pair of real pigs, Bad Dog documents just how far pets can push their owners and still get unconditional love. We span the globe looking for the naughtiest pets, to crown the baddest of the bad.

6.title: Picky Pets and Pet Peeves
6.plot: A curious kitty hits new heights, a camel mauls cars, a terrier buries burgers, Bad Dog documents how far pets can push their owners and still get unconditional love. We scour the globe for the naughtiest pets, to crown the baddest of the bad.

1.title: Hard Heads
1.plot: A dog that drops during walks, a pet skunk always gets her way, a cat has too much catnip, a dog gets on the kitchen counter and into a toaster oven, a dog keeps escaping its backyard.

2.title: Can't Touch This
2.plot: Owners wonder about their dog's intelligence, a balloon-popping bulldog thinks everything belongs to her, a cat steals from everyone in its neighborhood, a dog ransacks a kitchen and eats candy, a squirrel moves in and makes friends with a dog.

3.title: Food Fiends
3.plot: A dog loves all things ice cream, a dog keeps getting his head stuck in things, a cat plays the piano and is diva of the house, a parrot has a habit of rapping and swearing, a dog chews couches.

4.title: Monkey Business
4.plot: A pet monkey gets into things, a dog keeps breaking into the pantry, a cat is the king of his castle, a dancing dog steals attention, an owner watches on video monitors from work while his dog eats the furniture.

5.title: Pampered Pets
5.plot: A dog lives in his own wing of the house, a dog won't stop breaking into refrigerators, a cat rides a skateboard at the beach, a miniature pig steals food, a dog harasses its owners every time they try to clean the house.

6.title: Dog Gone
6.plot: Pets gone bad! In spite of her owners attempts to stop her, a dog won't let the ice-cream truck go by before getting a popsicle. Then, a cat steals food and wrecks the house, and a rabbit eats its owners food and won't stay out of the refrigerator.

7.title: Diggity Dogs
7.plot: A dog digs ditches in its backyard and his owners use a bulldozer to fill them in; goats run amok at a birthday party; a dog likes to steal underwear from its owner and his housemates; and more!

8.title: Foodies
8.plot: A pug is obsessed with pizza: taking it from hands, tables and the trash; a dog leaps child gates, jumps on counters and opens up drawers; a dog tears up the house and the backyard as all attempts to stop it prove futile; and more!

imdb.plot outline: Bad Dog documents just how far pets can push their owners and still get unconditional love. They are some of the baddest pets on the planet, but their owners love them just the way they are. You'll meet a balloon-popping bulldog, a piano-playing cat, a pet monkey that gets into everything, a prima donna skunk and other mischievous pets.
imdb.title: Bad Dog!
